p1.Sean: Hey, Hikari. You sure that those guys back there were telling us the truth? About the location of their headquarters and about that legendary orb or whatever?
p1.Hikari: ... Yes and no. This legendary orb of theirs definitely does have power to it, but we don’t know if they’re actually telling the truth about anything else. ... But it doesn’t matter. As long as there’s a chance that it’s true, we have to get there fast so that we can save Ren from them. If something were to happen to Ren because we were wasting time doubting, I’d never be able to forgive myself.
p1.Cow1: There they are! Call for reinforcements!

p2.Sean: Is it just me? Or are the number of enemies increasing?
